items.name: static let button: PDFAnnotationWidgetSubtype
items.desc: A button widget type, including push buttons, checkboxes, and radio buttons.

items.name: static let choice: PDFAnnotationWidgetSubtype
items.desc: A type that presents a list of choices the user can choose from.

items.name: static let text: PDFAnnotationWidgetSubtype
items.desc: A text field the user can type text in.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a widget subtype using the specified raw string value.
